ygData.subject: Re: shadowmen?
ygData.msgSnippet: Where can I find them!!?!??! ... From: Dark To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com Sent: Saturday, October 23, 1999 2:24 AM Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?
ygData.messageBody:
Where can I find them!!?!??!

----- Original Message -----
From: Dark
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, October 23, 1999 2:24 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?


Shadow Men are Necro's mortal enemies so we hate them.

Naeeldar
